product.name: Blackout Cake
product.description: A moist, rich, triple layer chocolate cake with a rich melt-in-your-mouth chocolate buttercream frosting and cake crumb coating.

product.name: Mango Crème Cake
product.description: Simple vanilla cake with mango compote layers covered in light whipped cream and fresh mangoes.

product.name: Caramel Cake
product.description: A fluffy, vanilla cake layered with caramel fudge, coated with a creamy caramel buttercream frosting.

product.name: Carrot Cake
product.description: An old-fashioned moist and tender carrot cake that is perfectly spiced with layers of cream cheese frosting coated with homemade streusels and ground walnuts. A must have!

product.name: Chocolate Decadent Cake
product.description: A super moist chocolate cake filled and coated with a rich, dark chococolate ganache.

product.name: Coffee Cashew Cake
product.description: Love coffee? Have a bite of this rich, triple-layer mocha cake for a treat that'll go well with your cuppa. With chocolate ganache, coffee buttercream frosting, and crushed cashew nuts as coating, it's a slice any coffee aficionado will devour!

product.name: Lemon Meringue Cake
product.description: A light sponge cake fiulled with lemon curd, covered in a toasted cloud-like, fluffy italian meringue frosting.

product.name: Pastel de Tres Leches Cake
product.description: Get this crowd-pleaser for your next party and watch it be a hit! Made of vanilla sponge cake soaked in three kinds of milk and caramel, it is made even better with its chantilly cream coating and strawberry buts topping, for a taste you can never say no to!

product.name: Red Velvet Cake
product.description: A moist, buttery and slightly chocolately spong cake covered in smooth cream cheese frosting, coated with red cake crumbs.

product.name: Rocky Road Cake
product.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake loaded with marshmallows, nuts and creamy chocolate ganache.

product.name: Strawberry Chantilly Cake
product.description: A light strawberry sponge cake filled with strawberry compôte, coated with chantilly cream and topped with fresh strawberries.

product.name: Strawberry Crème Cake
product.description: A buttery, strawberry sponge cake filled with strawberry compôte, coated with rich, strawberry cream.

product.name: Triple Decker Mousse Cake
product.description: A combination of moist chocolate cake, homemade chocolate ganache, and a smooth creamy layers of chocolate and white chocolate mousse.

product.name: Ube Castard Cake
product.description: Fluffy ube flavored chiffon cake with layers of homemade caramel custard cream coated with ube frosting and cake crumbs coating.

product.name: Vanilla Celebration Cake
product.description: A soft, vanilla cake froasted with sweet vanilla buttercream, topped off with fun sprinkles!

product.name: Apple Cheesecake
product.description: An apple a day keeps the doctor away! A mix of health and happiness in one cake. This cake is the perfect combination of your favorite creamy and rich cheesecake paired with a nice refreshing crunch from the apples.

product.name: Basque Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has a beautiful, dark exterior full of bittersweet notes that make the light, creamy cheesecake interior seem even more rich and flavorful.

product.name: Basque Ube Cheesecake
product.description: Get a burst of fresh blueberries with our Blueberry Cheesecake! With fluffy vanilla cheesecake, graham crust, and blueberry compote topping, it's a classic combination that you'll definitely enjoy.

product.name: Blueberry Cheesecake
product.description: This velvety and smooth, sweet and tangy cheesecake topped with blueberry filling.

product.name: Caramel Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked in moderate temperature, with water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The caramel sauce topping gives it just the right amount of creamy, sugary flavors.

product.name: Chocolate Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked in moderate temperature, with water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The batter and the whipped cream toppings are mixed with pure dark cocoa to give it just the perfect dash of bittersweet and chocolatey goodness.

product.name: Classic New York Cheesecake
product.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth craving with this all-time classic. With fluffy vanilla cheesecake on top of a graham crust, it is made complete with a thin sour cream layer for a bite you're maybe familiar with but will fall for all over again.

product.name: Coffee Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked at moderate temperature, with a water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The batter and the whipped cream toppings are mixed with coffee powder for an amazing coffee aroma.

product.name: Dulce de Leche Cheesecake
product.description: Have a slice of this fluffy vanilla cheesecake, made complete with graham crust and sweet dulce de leche fudge on top for a sweet treat no one can resist!

product.name: Matcha Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked in moderate temperature, with water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The batter and the whipped cream toppings are mixed with creamy matcha to give it just the perfect dash of green tea taste.

product.name: Oreo Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked in moderate temperature, with water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The layer of whipped cream topped with crushed Oreo cookies is definitely a hit for those cookies and cream fans.

product.name: Strawberry Cheesecake
product.description: This cheesecake has been baked in moderate temperature, with water bath, to make it rich, dense and creamy. The strawberry sauce topping gives it just the right amount of tart and sweet flavors.

product.description: Traditional Southern Red Velvet cupcake made with Belgian cocoa and topped with luscious cream cheese frosting

product.description: Valrhona dark chocolate cupcake topped with our refreshing peppermint frosting

product.description: Springy vanilla cupcake topped with our lemon buttercream frosting and sprinkles

product.name: Chocolate Overload
product.description: Rich, moist Valrhona chocolate cupcake filled with thick chocolate ganache crowned with velvety chocolate cream.
